Plugins

阿阳
2021-12-12
1 min

I wrote some plugins to implement some of the features of this theme. This section collects their documentation. Here is a list:

  • plugin-giscus: Giscus (comment system powered by GitHub Discussions)
  • plugin-chart: Chart.js (charts)
  • plugin-mermaid: Mermaid (diagrams)
  • plugin-katex: KaTeX (math rendering)
  • plugin-md-plus: Adding more syntax to Markdown, now supports footnote and mark
  • plugin-reading-time: Word count and reading time estimation
  • plugin-baidu-tongji: 百度统计
Edit this page on GitHub
Last Updated:

plugin-giscus

0
